name: Nature`s Secrets Cucumber Cleansing Milk
description: Enriched with cucumber and its natural antioxidants, this milky facial cleanser penetrates and removes deep seated impurities and excess oil, reducing pimples. It also removes all traces of make-up. Daily use brightens the skin-tone, leaving skin fresh, radiant, and pimple free. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
